details.description: This calculation will give you an idea of the amount you can expect to get or pay if you're arranging child maintenance yourself or through the Child Support Agency
details.introduction: Use the child maintenance calculator to agree on a child maintenance amount if you’re arranging it yourselves, or to get an idea of the amount the Child Support Agency (CSA) will work out for you.
